name: UpdateServiceFeatureEnablement
description:
Update the feature enablement for a service addon.

Update the feature enablement setting for a specific product addon on a PagerDuty service. This tool manages enabling or disabling the addon features. Currently, only 'aiops' is supported. Warnings may be returned if the account is not entitled to use AIOps features.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the PagerDuty resource to update the feature enablement for.

parameters.name: feature_enablement_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the feature enablement identifier, typically the addon name. Currently, only 'aiops' is supported.

value_schema.description: The feature enablement identifier, typically the name of the product addon. Currently only `aiops` is supported.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: The `Accept` header for versioning. Specify the desired API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Set the Content-Type of the request to 'application/json'.

parameters.name: feature_enablement_setting
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the feature enablement settings, including 'feature', 'enabled', 'updated_at', and 'warnings'.

feature.description: The name of the product addon whose set of features will be enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: A boolean value indicating whether the specified product addon is enabled or disabled.

updated_at.description: The time the feature enablement was last updated.

warnings.description: An array of warnings related to this feature enablement. Only present if warning conditions are met.

value_schema.description: The feature enablement setting to apply.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: feature_name
parameters.description: The feature enablement identifier, typically the name of the product addon. Currently only `aiops` is supported.

value_schema.description: The feature enablement identifier, typically the name of the product addon. Currently only `aiops` is supported.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The feature enablement setting to apply.

feature.description: The name of the product addon whose set of features will be enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: A boolean value indicating whether the specified product addon is enabled or disabled.

updated_at.description: The time the feature enablement was last updated.

warnings.description: An array of warnings related to this feature enablement. Only present if warning conditions are met.

value_schema.description: The feature enablement setting to apply.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
